activity.description:
The type of activity
* SET: Fishing set
* LANDING: Landing
* TRANSHIP: Tranship
* BUNKING_CREW_CHANGE: Bunkering or crew change
* NET_CLEANING: Net cleaning
* FAO: Handling FAO
* SEARCHING: Searching...
* TRANSIT: Transit
* BREAKDOWN: Breakdown
* BAD_WEATHER: Bad Weather
* OTHER: Other requires text message to be sent

mmsi.description: The mmsi of the device sending the message

serial.description: Serial number of the VMS-100 unit.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the message transmission (in minute accuracy).

Activity Message - Activity.title: Activity Message - Activity
Activity Message - Activity.description: Fishing activity start point equivalent to ID type 6

mmsi.description: The mmsi of the device sending the message

serial.description: Serial number of the VMS-100 unit.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the message transmission (in minute accuracy).

vesselId.description: Vessel ID from the predetermined list of authorised bunkering vessels.

mmsi.description: The mmsi of the device sending the message

serial.description: Serial number of the VMS-100 unit.

speciesId.description: ID of the caught species from the master species list

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the message transmission (in minute accuracy).

units.description: Units to use when interpreting the weight_count field, true=weight, false=units

weight_count.description: Either the number of units caught or the weight (kilos)

finished.description: When set, indicates that a species landing has finished.

mmsi.description: The mmsi of the device sending the message

note1.description:
If discard == true, Regionally defined enumeration.
Otherwise regionally defined storage location identifier.
Describes where on the vessel the catch was taken from.

serial.description: Serial number of the VMS-100 unit.

speciesId.description: Species of the fish that was caught

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the message transmission (in minute accuracy).

units.description: Units to use when interpreting the weight_count field, true=weight, false=units

unloading.description: When set, indicates that a species is being unloaded during a landing.

weight_count.description: Either the number of units caught or the weight (kilos)

Activity Message - Landing Report Specie.title: Activity Message - Landing Report Species
Activity Message - Landing Report Specie.description: Record of a transfer of some fish of a specific species during a landing

mmsi.description: The mmsi of the device sending the message

plannedDuration.description: Planned duration of trip in days. 0 = same day, max 31, where 31 means 31 or longer

returnPortId.description: Where the trip is destined to end

serial.description: Serial number of the VMS-100 unit.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the message transmission (in minute accuracy).

Activity Message - Pre Departure.title: Activity Message - Pre Departure
Activity Message - Pre Departure.description: Represents pre-departure statement for a fishing trip

mmsi.description: The mmsi of the device sending the message

serial.description: Serial number of the VMS-100 unit.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the message transmission (in minute accuracy).

Activity Message - Prior Notification.title: Activity Message - Prior Notification
Activity Message - Prior Notification.description: Prior notification statement for a fishing trip

mmsi.description: The mmsi of the device sending the message

serial.description: Serial number of the VMS-100 unit.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the message transmission (in minute accuracy).

mmsi.description: The mmsi of the device sending the message

proposedDate.description: When the trip is planned to start

serial.description: Serial number of the VMS-100 unit.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the message transmission (in minute accuracy).

vesselId.description: Id of the vessel that was transshipped, null = Other/unkown

Activity Message - Transhipment.title: Activity Message - Transhipment
Activity Message - Transhipment.description: A request (proposal) to do transhipment of fish. VMS-100 Function id5

mmsi.description: The mmsi of the device sending the message

note1.description:
If discard == true, Regionally defined enumeration.
Otherwise regionally defined storage location identifier.
Describes where on the vessel the catch was taken from.

serial.description: Serial number of the VMS-100 unit.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the message transmission (in minute accuracy).

transId.description: 22-bit hash of FMC assigned authorisation code

transfer.description: When set, indicates that fish-cargo was transferred to the transhipment vessel.

transhipPortId.description: The ID in the port table

transhipVesselId.description: Vessel involved in transhipment NULL = other

units.description: Units to use when interpreting the weight_count field, true=weight, false=units

weight_count.description: Either the number of units caught or the weight (kilos)

Activity Message - Transhipment Species.title: Activity Message - Transhipment Species
Activity Message - Transhipment Species.description: Record of a transfer of some fish of a specific species during a transhipment

data.description: The image file contents, base64 Encoded data

timeTaken.description: The original time that the photo was taken

type.description:
The type of the photo
* VESSEL_BOW: Photo looking at the bow of a vessel
* VESSEL_STERN: Photo looking at the stern of a vessel
* VESSEL_PORT: Photo looking at the port side of a vessel
* VESSEL_STARBOARD: Photo looking at the starboard side of a vessel
* INSTALLATION: Photo of the installation
* CAPTAIN: Photo of the captain
* INSTALLATION_RECEIPT: Photo of the installer's signature kept as the installation's receipt
* TRANSCEIVER_LOCATION: Photo of the transceiver

device.description: Detail of the handset linked to this device

installationLog.description: The Installation Log for this Registration

serial.description: The serial number of the VMS100 device

vesselRegistration.description: The vessel linked to this registration (the national registration number as assigned by the governing flag state).

Device Registration.title: Device Registration
Device Registration.description: Device registration which links together various ids and properties of the vessel

enabled.description: Is the handset currently allowed to interact with system

companyId.description: The company associated with this installer

dob.description: The users day date of birth

email.description: Email or emails of the user separated by ';'

enabled.description: Tells if user can login and perform actions

imei.description: The device IMEI associated with this user

observerShortId.description: The numeric ID of this observer

role.description:
The users role
* ADMINISTRATOR: IMP Administrator
* OBSERVER: Authenticated as an ERS3 observer user
* INSTALLER: Authenticated as an ERS4 installer user
* ERS_DEVICE: Authenticated as an ERS1 device

activities.description: List of activities (transfers, dumping or bunkering)

id.description: ID of the form, will be assigned by the server when submitting the form

observerUsername.description: The observer username. Will be assigned based on the currently authentication

tripId.description: The trip that the form was completed for

updated.description: Time this form was updated/submitted to the server

vesselName.description: The name of the observers vessel

actionCode.description:
The activity of the vessel
* FI: Fishing
* PF: Possibly Fishing
* NF: Not Fishing
* DF: Dumping Fish
* TR: Receiving - transhipment fish
* SR: Receiving - Set Sharing
* BR: Receiving - Bunkering
* OR: Receiving - Other
* TG: Giving - transhipment fish
* SG: Giving - Set Sharing
* BG: Giving - Bunkering
* OG: Giving - Other

comments.description: Free space to add additional information

dateTime.description: The date and time of the observed signing, ship time.

flag.description: The flag of the vessel ISO-3166

type.description:
The vessel type
* 1: Single purse seine
* 2: Longline
* 3: Pole and line
* 4: Mothership
* 5: Troll
* 6: Net boat
* 7: Bunker
* 8: Anchor or light boat
* 9: Fish carrier
* 10: Trawler
* 21: Light aircraft
* 22: Helicopter
* 31: Other

weightBET.description: The weight in MT of the BET caught/transferred

weightMixed.description: The weight in MT of any other fish caught/transferred

weightSKJ.description: The weight in MT of the SKJ caught/transferred

weightYFT.description: The weight in MT of the YFT caught/transferred

code.description:
Condition code
* A0: Alive but unable to describe condition.
* A1: Alive and healthy
* A2: Alive, but injured or distressed
* A3: Alive, but unlikely to live
* A4: Entangled, okay
* A5: Entangled, injured
* A6: Hooked, externally, injured
* A7: Hooked, internally, injured
* A8: Hooked, unknown injured
* D: Dead
* D1: Entangled, dead
* D2: Hooked, externally, dead
* D3: Hooked, internally, dead
* D4: Hooked, unknown, dead
* U: Condition unknown
* U1: Entangled, unknown condition
* U2: Hooked, externally, condition unknown
* U3: Hooked, internally, condition unknown
* U4: Hooked, unknown, condition unknown

activityCode.description:
The activity the vessel was observed performing
* FI: Fishing
* PF: Possibly Fishing
* NF: Not Fishing
* DF: Dumping Fish
* TR: Receiving - transhipment fish
* SR: Receiving - Set Sharing
* BR: Receiving - Bunkering
* OR: Receiving - Other
* TG: Giving - transhipment fish
* SG: Giving - Set Sharing
* BG: Giving - Bunkering
* OG: Giving - Other

comments.description: Free space to add additional information

dateTime.description: The date and time of the sighing, ship time.

flag.description: The flag of the sighted vessel ISO-3166

ircs.description: The call sign of the sighted vessel

name.description: The name of the sighted vessel

position.description: The position of the observer's vessel at the time of the sighting

type.description:
The vessel type code
* 1: Single purse seine
* 2: Longline
* 3: Pole and line
* 4: Mothership
* 5: Troll
* 6: Net boat
* 7: Bunker
* 8: Anchor or light boat
* 9: Fish carrier
* 10: Trawler
* 21: Light aircraft
* 22: Helicopter
* 31: Other

FORM GEN-1 - Sighting.title: FORM GEN-1 - Sighting
FORM GEN-1 - Sighting.description: GEN-1 Report Sighting entry for vessel or aircraft

data.description: The data of the file encoded as base64, must be a PNG or JPG, maximum size 5 megabytes

date.description: The date and time the photo was taken

filename.description: File name of the photo, if not supplied a random name will be generated

FORM GEN-1 - Sighting Photo.title: FORM GEN-1 - Sighting Photo
FORM GEN-1 - Sighting Photo.description: An image captured by the ERS3 device

activity.description:
Vessel activity during encounter
* 0: Hauling
* 1: Searching
* 2: Transiting
* 3: Other

discardedCondition.description:
The condition code when discarded
* A0: Alive but unable to describe condition.
* A1: Alive and healthy
* A2: Alive, but injured or distressed
* A3: Alive, but unlikely to live
* A4: Entangled, okay
* A5: Entangled, injured
* A6: Hooked, externally, injured
* A7: Hooked, internally, injured
* A8: Hooked, unknown injured
* D: Dead
* D1: Entangled, dead
* D2: Hooked, externally, dead
* D3: Hooked, internally, dead
* D4: Hooked, unknown, dead
* U: Condition unknown
* U1: Entangled, unknown condition
* U2: Hooked, externally, condition unknown
* U3: Hooked, internally, condition unknown
* U4: Hooked, unknown, condition unknown

discardedDesc.description: The description of the discarded condition

landedCondition.description:
Condition code when the species was landed
* A0: Alive but unable to describe condition.
* A1: Alive and healthy
* A2: Alive, but injured or distressed
* A3: Alive, but unlikely to live
* A4: Entangled, okay
* A5: Entangled, injured
* A6: Hooked, externally, injured
* A7: Hooked, internally, injured
* A8: Hooked, unknown injured
* D: Dead
* D1: Entangled, dead
* D2: Hooked, externally, dead
* D3: Hooked, internally, dead
* D4: Hooked, unknown, dead
* U: Condition unknown
* U1: Entangled, unknown condition
* U2: Hooked, externally, condition unknown
* U3: Hooked, internally, condition unknown
* U4: Hooked, unknown, condition unknown

landedDesc.description: Description of the condition when the species was landed

lengthCode.description:
Length code
* UF: Measurement for any marine mammals, sharks
* CL: Measurement for turtles

sex.description:
The sex of the species
* M: Male
* F: Female
* I: Indeterminate
* U: Unknown

FORM GEN-1 - Species landed on deck.title: FORM GEN-1 - Species landed on deck

type.description:
Tag type
* 0: Common Dart
* 1: Archival
* 2: Pop-Up

dateTime.description: The ship board date and time of the encounter

id.description: ID of the form, will be assigned by the server when submitting the form

interacted.description: Details of the interaction when the species interacted with the vessel or gear
interacted.$ref: #/definitions/FORM GEN-2 - Interaction with vessel or gear

landed.description: Details of the interaction when the species was landed

location.description: Vessel position at time of encounter

observerUsername.description: The observer username. Will be assigned based on the currently authentication

sighted.description: Details of the interaction when the species was only sighted

species.description:
Species code
* TTL: LOGGERHEAD TURTLE
* DKK: LEATHERBACK TURTLE
* TUG: GREEN TURTLE
* LKV: OLIVE RIDLEY TURTLE
* TTH: HAWKSBILL TURTLE
* KEZ: EASTERN PACIFIC GREEN TURTLE (BLACK TURTLE)
* FBT: FLATBACK TURTLE
* TTX: ALL TURTLES
* FAW: FALSE KILLER WHALE
* SHW: SHORT-FINNED PILOT WHALE
* KPW: PYGMY KILLER WHALE
* MEW: MELON HEADED WHALE
* HUW: HUMPBACK WHALE
* SIW: SEI WHALE
* MYS: BALEEN WHALE
* ODM: TOOTHED WHALES
* MAM: ALL MARINE MAMMALS
* BRW: BRYDE'S WHALE
* RHN: WHALE SHARK
* DBO: BOTTLENOSE DOLPHIN
* DCO: COMMON DOLPHIN
* DRR: RISSO'S DOLPHIN
* DSI: SPINNER DOLPHIN
* DSP: SPOTTED DOLPHIN
* DST: STRIPPED DOLPHINS
* RTD: ROUGH TOOTHED DOLPHIN
* DLP: ALL DOLPHINS
* BIZ: ALL BIRDS

timeType.description:
Indicate the type of time recorded
* 0: Time of landing
* 1: Time of interaction/sighting

tripId.description: The trip that the form was completed for

type.description:
Encounter type
* 0: Landed on deck
* 1: Interacted with vessels gear only
* 2: Sighted only

updated.description: Time this form was updated/submitted to the server

activity.description:
Vessel activity during encounter
* 0: Hauling
* 1: Searching
* 2: Transiting
* 3: Other

end.description: Conditions at the end of the condition

start.description: Conditions at the start of the interaction

FORM GEN-2 - Interaction with vessel or.title: FORM GEN-2 - Interaction with vessel or gear

answers.description: Answers to the question asked by the form

date.description: The date/time that the form was completed by the user

id.description: ID of the form, will be assigned by the server when submitting the form

observerUsername.description: The observer username. Will be assigned based on the currently authentication

tripId.description: The trip that the form was completed for

updated.description: Time this form was updated/submitted to the server

asFound.description:
FAD as found
* 1: Man made object (Drifting FAD)
* 2: Man made object (Non FAD)
* 3: Tree or Log (natural, free floating)
* 4: Tree or logs (converted into FAD)
* 5: Debris (flotsam bunched together)
* 6: Dead Animal (specify; i.e. whale, horse, etc.) 
* 7: Anchored raft, FAD , or payao
* 8: Anchored Tree or Logs
* 9: Other (please specify)
* 10: Man-made object (Drifting FAD)-changed,

asLeft.description:
FAD as left
* 1: Man made object (Drifting FAD)
* 2: Man made object (Non FAD)
* 3: Tree or Log (natural, free floating)
* 4: Tree or logs (converted into FAD)
* 5: Debris (flotsam bunched together)
* 6: Dead Animal (specify; i.e. whale, horse, etc.) 
* 7: Anchored raft, FAD , or payao
* 8: Anchored Tree or Logs
* 9: Other (please specify)
* 10: Man-made object (Drifting FAD)-changed,

dateTime.description: The ship board date and time see PS/RN-1

origin.description:
Origin of FAD
* 1: Your vessel deployed this trip
* 2: Other vessel deployed previous trip
* 3: Other vessels (owner consent)
* 4: Other vessels (no owner consent
* 5: Other vessels (consent unknown)
* 6: Drifting and found by your vessel
* 7: Deployed by FAD auxiliary vessel
* 8: Origin unknown
* 9: Other origin

sketch.description: Sketch image, PNG or JPG base 64 encoded

id.description: ID of the form, will be assigned by the server when submitting the form

observerUsername.description: The observer username. Will be assigned based on the currently authentication

records.description: Record for each activity that involve a FAD

tripId.description: The trip that the form was completed for

updated.description: Time this form was updated/submitted to the server

FORM GEN-5 - Fish aggregating device inf.title: FORM GEN-5 - Fish aggregating device information

fishingGrounds.description:
Fishing grounds
* 0: NORTH WEST PHILIPPINES SEA
* 1: CENTRAL WEST PHILIPPINE SEA
* 2: SULU SEA
* 3: CELEBES SEA
* 4: CENTRAL PACIFIC SEABOARD
* 5: CENTRAL NORTH PACIFIC SEABOARD
* 6: OTHER

id.description: ID of the form, will be assigned by the server when submitting the form

observerUsername.description: The observer username. Will be assigned based on the currently authentication

tripId.description: The trip that the form was completed for

updated.description: Time this form was updated/submitted to the server

maturity.description:
Maturity
* I: IMMATURE
* II: MATURING
* III: RIPENING
* IV: RIPE
* V: SPENT

sex.description:
Species Sex
* M: Male
* F: Female
* I: Indeterminate
* U: Unknown

aircraftRange.description: The effective range of the aircraft

aircraftRangeUnits.description:
Units of the effective range
* KM: Kilometer
* NM: Nautical mile

cellPhoneNumber.description: Number of Cell phone or blank for no cell phone

cfvgl.description: Commercial Fishing Vessel and gear License Number

crewCount.description: Total No. Of Crew Including Captain And Fishing Master

engineUnits.description:
The units for engine power, required if engine is set
* kW: Kilowatt
* PS: Metric horse power
* HP: Horse power

faxNumber.description: Number of facsimile or blank for no facsimile machine

gearType.description:
Gear type
* PS: Purse seine
* RN: Ringnet

holdType.description:
Fish Hold (Well) Type
* CAT: Catcher, the vessel has its own fish hold
* CAR: Carrier, the fishhold capacity is from the Carrier vessel

id.description: ID of the form, will be assigned by the server when submitting the form

markingsConsistentWin.description: If Vessel is using WIN No. are the Markings Consistent with CMM 2004-03

meshUnits.description:
Units used describing the net dimensions
* CM: Centimeters
* INS: Inches

netDepthUnits.description:
The units for specifying the maximum depth of nets
* MTR: Meters
* YDS: Yards
* FATH: Fathoms

netLengthUnits.description:
The units for specifying the maximum length of nets
* MTR: Meters
* YDS: Yards
* FATH: Fathoms

observerUsername.description: The observer username. Will be assigned based on the currently authentication

satPhoneNumber.description: Number or blank for no Satellite phone

tonnage.description: The weight of the vessel in mT

tonnageUnits.description:
The vessel may be registered using Gross Tonnage (GT) or in (GRT) this will be indicated on the vessel registration papers.
* GRT: Indicated on the vessel registration paper
* GT: Gross Tonnage

tripId.description: The trip that the form was completed for

tripStartDate.description: The starting date and time of the trip specified in ship time

tripStartLocation.description: The starting location of the trip

updated.description: Time this form was updated/submitted to the server

vesselLengthUnits.description:
The units for the vessel length field, required if vesselLength is set
* MTR: Meters
* YDS: Yards
* FATH: Fathoms

id.description: Identifier of VMS for example MMSI

dateTime.description: Start of daily activity date and time, should be in ship time and include the relevant timezone info. ISO 8601 + timezone

id.description: ID of the form, will be assigned by the server when submitting the form

observerUsername.description: The observer username. Will be assigned based on the currently authentication

tripId.description: The trip that the form was completed for

updated.description: Time this form was updated/submitted to the server

activity.description:
Activity code
* SET: Set
* SEARCHING: Searching
* TRANSIT: Transit (Fishing Gear Stowed)
* BREAKDOWN: No fishing - Breakdown
* BAD_WEATHER: No fishing - Bad weather
* IN_PORT: In port - Please specify port
* NET_CLEANING: Net cleaning set
* INVEST_FREE_SCHOOL: Investigate free school
* INVEST_FLOATING_OBJECT: Investigate floating object
* DEPLOY: Deploy - Raft, FAD or paylao
* RETRIEVE: Retrieve - Raft, FAD or payao
* DRIFT_DAYS_END: No fishing - Drifting at day's end
* DRIFT_FLOATING_OBJECT: No fishing - Drifting with floating object
* OTHER: No fishing - Other reason (specify)
* DRIFT: Drifting - With fish aggregating lights
* RET_RADIO_BUOY: Retrieve radio buoy
* DEPLOY_RADIO_BUOY: Deploy radio buoy
* TRANS_OR_BUNK: Transhipping or bunkering
* SERVICE_FAD: Servicing FAD or Floating Object
* HELI_TAKEOFF: Helicopter takes off to search
* HELI_RETURN: Helicopter returned from search

association.description:
School association
* 1: Unassociated
* 2: Feeding on Bait fish
* 3: Drifting log, debris, dead animal
* 4: Drifting Raft, FAD, Payload
* 5: Anchored Raft, FAD, Payload
* 6: Live whales/marine mammals
* 7: Live whale shark
* 8: Other floating object
* 9: No tuna associated

date.description: Date and time the activity took place, should be in ship time, ISO 8601 + timezone

method.description:
How was detection performed?
* 1: Seen from vessel
* 2: Seen from helicopter
* 3: Marked and beacon
* 4: Bird radar
* 5: Sonar / depth sounder
* 6: Info. From other vessel.
* 7: Anchored FAD/payload (recorded

sea.description:
Sea condition
* C: Calm
* S: Slight
* M: Moderate
* R: Rough

fishCarrierHolds.description: Holds used on the fish carrier

id.description: ID of the form, will be assigned by the server when submitting the form

observerEstimates.description:
Record of the estimated retained and discarded catch made by the observer
There should be only one record for each pair of species and fate

observerStart.description: Record the start of set usually recorded when the pelican hook is released and net skiff slides to the water taking the net with it

observerUsername.description: The observer username. Will be assigned based on the currently authentication

special.description: Record of each species of special interest that was handled during the set

items.$ref: #/definitions/FORM RN-3 - Record of species of special interest

totalObserverEstimate.description: Observers total catch estimate in mT

totalVesselEstimate.description: The vessel captains total catch estimate in mT

tripId.description: The trip that the form was completed for

updated.description: Time this form was updated/submitted to the server

vesselLogged.description:
Record of the retained and discarded catch entered to the vessel log
There should be only one record for each pair of species and fate

vesselStart.description: The time that was entered in the log for the same set

count.description: The number that was either retains or discarded

fate.description:
The fate code for this record
* RWW: Retained - Whole weight
* RHG: Retained - Headed and gutted (billfish only)
* RGG: Retained - Gilled and gutted (kept for sale)
* RPT: Retained - Partial (e.g. fillet, loin)
* RCC: Retained - Crew consumption (onboard)
* ROR: Retained - Other reason (specify)
* RFR: Retained trunk - Fins retained (shark only)
* DFR: Discarded trunk - Fins retained (shark only
* DTS: Discarded - Too small (tuna only)
* DGD: Discarded - Gear damage
* DVF: Discarded - Vessel fully loaded
* DUD: Discarded - Unwanted species
* DSD: Discarded - Shark damage
* DWD: Discarded - Whale damage
* DPQ: Discarded - Poor quality
* DPA: Discarded - Species of special interest - Alive
* DPD: Discarded - Species of special interest - Dead
* DPU: Discarded - Species of special interest - Unknown condition
* DOR: Discarded - Other reasons
* ESC: Escaped

weight.description: The weight that was either kept or discarded

* RWW: Retained - Whole weight

* RGG: Retained - Gilled and gutted (kept for sale)
* RPT: Retained - Partial (e.g. fillet, loin)

* DFR: Discarded trunk - Fins retained (shark only

* DGD: Discarded - Gear damage
* DVF: Discarded - Vessel fully loaded

FORM RN-3 - Fate record (Vessel Estimate.description: A record of the fate of an amount of catch. Either weight or count must be set, not both

caught.description:
Condition when caught
* A0: Not Categorised
* A1: Alive Healthy
* A2: Alive Injured
* A3: Alive but dying
* D: Dead
* U: Condition unknown

released.description:
Condition when released
* A0: Not Categorised
* A1: Alive Healthy
* A2: Alive Injured
* A3: Alive but dying
* D: Dead
* U: Condition unknown

FORM RN-3 - Record of species of special.title: FORM RN-3 - Record of species of special interest

id.description: ID of the form, will be assigned by the server when submitting the form

instrument.description:
Record whether calipers, measuring board, flat ruler or deck tape was used.
* AC: Aluminium caliper
* MB: Measuring board
* DT: Deck tape
* OTR: Other

observerUsername.description: The observer username. Will be assigned based on the currently authentication

sampleValue.description: The sample value, dependant on the set type

samples.description: Sampling of length for catch set

setType.description:
Set type
* 0: Free school
* 1: Floating object

startTime.description: Start of set usually recorded when the pelican hook is released and net skiff slides to the water taking the net with it

totals.description: The totals, one record per species

tripId.description: The trip that the form was completed for

updated.description: Time this form was updated/submitted to the server

length.description: The length of the sampled fish (cm)

activity.description:
Activity when found
* 1: Fishing
* 2: Transfer/Transhipment
* 3: Unloading at port

catchEstimate.description: Area where the catch was estimated to have occurred

catchExact.description: The exact position of the catch

catchLocationDescription.description: Describe the location of the catch

dateEstimateFrom.description: The the beginning date, if the date was estimated

dateEstimateTo.description: The the end date, if the date was estimated

dateExact.description: The exact date of the record

dateFound.description: The date when the tag was found

dateType.description:
Is the date estimated or exact
* 0: Exact
* 1: Estimated

finderInformation.description: Information about the finder of the tag for the lottery

fishingMethod.description:
The fishing method used
* 0: Longline
* 1: Purse seine
* 2: Troll
* 3: Handline
* 4: Gill Net
* 5: Other

fishingMethodOther.description: The method of fishing if other

flag.description: The flag of the vessel. ISO country code

howMeasured.description:
How was the fish measured. Required if length specified
* 0: Measuring tool
* 1: Estimated

howWeighed.description:
How was the fish weighed. Required if weight was recorded
* 0: Measuring tool
* 1: Estimated

id.description: ID of the form, will be assigned by the server when submitting the form

nameOfMeasurer.description: The name of the measurer. Required if who measured is other

observerUsername.description: The observer username. Will be assigned based on the currently authentication

schoolType.description:
The school type
* 0: Log
* 1: Free School
* 2: Anchored FAD
* 3: Drifting FAD

species.description: The FAO species code of the fish

stateWhenMeasured.description:
The process state when the measurement occurred. Required if measured
* 0: Fresh
* 1: Frozen
* 2: Frozen then thawed

stateWhenWeighed.description:
Process state when weighed. Required if weight was recorded
* 0: Whole weight
* 1: Gilled & Gutted
* 2: Other

transhipmentInfo.description: If the tag was found during transhipment provide details

tripId.description: The trip that the form was completed for

updated.description: Time this form was updated/submitted to the server

vesselName.description: Name of the vessel catching the fish

weight.description: The weight recorded in kilograms. null == not weighted

wellNo.description: Well number where fish found, if applicable

where.description:
Where was the tag found
* 1: Fishing Vessel
* 2: Reefer/Transfer/Carrier
* 3: Cold Storage

whoMeasured.description:
Who performed the measurement. Required if length specified
* 0: Port Sampler
* 1: Observer
* 2: Other

completedBy.description: Name of the person completing the form

name.description: The name of the person who found the tag

provided.description: The tag was provided with this form

reward.description:
The type of reward given
* 0: Not Given
* 1: T-Shirt
* 2: Cap
* 3: Cash

flag.description: The flag of the carrier vessel

questionId.description:
The question code that was answered
* RSA: Did the operator or any crew member assault, obstruct, resist, delay, refuse boarding to, intimidate or interfere with observers in the performance of their duties
* RSB: Request that an event not be reported by the observer
* RSC: Mistreat other crew
* RSD: Did the operator fail to provide the observer, while onboard the vessel, at no expense to the observer or the observers Government, with food, accommodation [access to safety gear] and medical facilities of a reasonable standard equivalent to those normally available to an officer on board the vessel.
* NRA: Fish in areas where the vessel is not permitted to fish 
* NRB: Target species other than those they are licensed to target
* NRC: Use a fishing method other than those they are licensed to target
* NRD: Not display or present a valid (and current) licence document onboard
* NRE: Transfer or transship fish from or to another vessel
* NRF: Was involved in bunkering activities
* NRG: Fail to stow fishing gear when entering areas where a vessel is not authorized to fish
* WCA: Fail to comply with any Commission Conservation and Management measures (CMMs)
* WCB: High grade the catch
* WCC: Incorrectly dispose of fish offal
* LPA: Inaccurately record vessel position on vessel logsheets for sets, hauling and catch 
* LPB: Fail to report vessel position to countries, where required when entering and leaving an EEZ (crossing to or from an EEZ into or out of the High Seas)
* LCA: Inaccurately record retained Target Species in the Vessel logs or weekly reports 
* LCB: Inaccurately record Target Species Discards
* LCC: Record target species inaccurately
* LCD: Not record bycatch discards
* LCE: Inaccurately record retained bycatch species
* LCF: Inaccurately record discarded bycatch species
* SIA: Land on deck Species of Special Interest (SSIs)
* SIB: Interact (not land) with SSIs (e.g. Marine mammals, turtle or whale sharks)
* PNA: Dispose of any metals, plastics, chemicals or old fishing gear
* PNB: Discharge any oil
* PNC: Lose any fishing gear
* PND: Abandon any fishing gear
* PNE: Fail to report any abandoned gear
* SSA: Fail to monitor international Safety frequencies
* SSB: Carry out-of-date safety equipment

bluetoothId.description: Bluetooth id of the unit being installed

created.description: Date/Time that the installation log was created. Created implicitly

id.description: The identifier of this Installation Log

installer.description: User name of the installing user. Set by server

newInstallation.description: True a new installation false a repair

serial.description: The serial number of the VMS 100

Installation Log.title: Installation Log
Installation Log.description: Details of the installation of the VMS100 onto a vessel

text.description: Description of the location such as the name of a port

Location Description.title: Location Description
Location Description.description: Capture the description of a location as either a name, a lat/lon or a port reference

reason.description:
Why the login failed
* BAD_CREDENTIAL: The username or password was incorrect
* LOCKED: The account is locked due to too many failed login attempts
* DISABLED: The account has been disabled or the company associated with the account was disabled

accessToken.description: The bearer token to be used for authentication

observerId.description: If authenticated as Observer, this will be the observer Id of the current user

refreshToken.description: The refresh token for future token exchange

role.description:
Authenticated role
* ADMINISTRATOR: IMP Administrator
* OBSERVER: Authenticated as an ERS3 observer user
* INSTALLER: Authenticated as an ERS4 installer user
* ERS_DEVICE: Authenticated as an ERS1 device

username.description: The username if logged in as a user

entries.description: The list of entries for this lookup

version.description: The version of the lookup table

id.description: The value to send in AIS messages

refId.description: The 'long ID' ie the full system ID for this entry

agentVersion.description: The version of the agent lookup table known by this mmsi.

associationCodeVersion.description: The version of the association code lookup table known by this mmsi.

bunkeringVesselVersion.description: The version of the bunkering vessel lookup table known by this mmsi.

discard0Version.description: The version of the discard0 code lookup table known by this mmsi.

discard1Version.description: The version of the discard1 code lookup table known by this mmsi.

portVersion.description: The version of the port lookup table known by this mmsi.

speciesVersion.description: The version of the species lookup table known by this mmsi.

transhipVesselVersion.description: The version of the tranship vessel lookup table known by this mmsi.

path.description: Path of the request generating the error

NotFoundResponse.title: NotFoundResponse
NotFoundResponse.description: The resource requested was not found

customerId.description: The id that is used by the customer

author.description: The author(s) of the scientific name.

code.description: The id of the species. Includes the widely used three-letter code for the exchange of data between nations and custom ids as well. Special values: UNKN (Unknown) and OTHR (Other)

enabled.description: Flag that allows for configuring only a subset of items to be visible to users.

fao.description: Whether this is a fao entry. False means custom.

isscaap.description: International Standard Statistical Classification for Aquatic Animals and Plants (ISSCAAP) divides commercial species into 50 groups on the basis of their taxonomic, ecological and economic characteristics.

scientific_name.description: The scientific name at the species, genus, family or higher taxonomic levels. Subspecies not considered.

speciesOrder.description: The order of the species plus other high taxonomic levels (e.g. divisions, classes, suborders, etc).

taxocode.description: Code used by FAO for a more detalied classification of the species items and for sorting them out within each ISSCAAP group.

accessPortId.description: The port that the observer accesses the vessel from

accessVesselId.description: If the observer took another vessel to get to the vessel, this will be an identifier of that vessel

country.description: Country waters where the trip is to take place (ALPHA2 code).

endDate.description: The proposed end date and time, zulu time

shortId.description: The short trip ID used by AIS

startDate.description: The proposed starting date and time of the trip, zulu time

vesselId.description: The identifier of the vessel that the observer will be working on, maybe a MMSI a callsign or another type of ID

year.description: Year the trip to begin. Not necessarily equal to start date. For example programme 2019 can run from March to April next year.

Trip.title: Trip
Trip.description: Describes a trip where some activities occurred

UpdateResponse.title: UpdateResponse
UpdateResponse.description: Response for when a change has occurred

beam.description: The beam (width) of the vessel in meters

engines.description: The power in HP for each engine on the boat, for a boat with 1, 20 HP engine this would be [20]

homeportId.description: The home port for this vessel

length.description: The length of the vessel in meters

registration.description:
The vessel's national registration number as assigned by the governing flag state. 
This value will reference this vessel in third party government databases, for the Philippines this is the'marina number' field in the Felis database

Vessel Information - Owner or crew info.title: Vessel Information - Owner or crew info

powerUnits.description:
The units that the engine power is measured in
* kW: Kilowatt
* PS: Metric horse power
* HP: Horse power

taken.description: The time and date the photo was taken on

type.description:
What the photo represents
* VESSEL_BOW: Photo looking at the bow of a vessel
* VESSEL_STERN: Photo looking at the stern of a vessel
* VESSEL_PORT: Photo looking at the port side of a vessel
* VESSEL_STARBOARD: Photo looking at the starboard side of a vessel
* INSTALLATION: Photo of the installation
* CAPTAIN: Photo of the captain
* INSTALLATION_RECEIPT: Photo of the installer's signature kept as the installation's receipt
* TRANSCEIVER_LOCATION: Photo of the transceiver
